remarks: Every (possibly proper) subclass of a class ` A ` with a founded, set-like relation ` R ` has a minimal element.  Lemma 4.3 of Don Monk's notes for Advanced Set Theory, which can be found at ~ http://euclid.colorado.edu/~~monkd/settheory .  This is a very strong generalization of ~ tz6.26 and ~ tz7.5 .  (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 4-Feb-2011.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 26-Jun-2015.)
statement:

$d B y $.
$d R y $.
